item.title: The lazy man's blog
item.description: A static blog.. The simplest way possible. I am a big fan of keeping this simple, especially to start. With side projects I’ve found that I have a tendency to obsess over finding the exact right solution for the job. This leads me to come up with some sort of over engineered mess that will ultimately never see the light of day. Picking a blogging solution was no exception to this.
